Title: Apple and Walnut Salad
Description: A refreshing and healthy salad with a mix of crisp apples and crunchy walnuts.
Preparation Steps: "1. Wash and chop the apples into bite-sized pieces. 2. In a mixing bowl
Food Produces: combine the chopped apples and walnuts. 3. Toss the salad with your favorite dressing. 4. Serve chilled."

Description: A creamy and delicious smoothie made with ripe bananas.
